Description: eSM module: System error detected:Input SETUPMODE_BParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
eSM module: System error detected:Input GUARD_BParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
eSM module: System error detected:Input GUARD_ACKParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
eSM module: System error detected:Input /INTERLOCK_IN_BParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
eSM module: System error detected:Input /ESTOP_BParameter _SigLatched Bit 23

Cause: Temperature of the eSM too low.

Description: eSM module: OvervoltageESM24VDCParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: Voltage too high at the ESM24VDC.

Correctives: Verify the ambient conditions. Verifythat the flow of air is sufficient(pollution, objects).

Description: eSM module: System error detected:Operating states not identicalParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
eSM module: System error detected:Software versions not identicalParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
eSM module: Error detected duringSafe Operating Stop (SOS) afterdetected errorParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: Motor movement during SafeOperating Stop (SOS).

Description: eSM module: System error detected:Software incompatible with hardwareParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
eSM module: Error detected duringdeceleration to Safely Limited Speed(SLS)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: Velocity of drive greater than speedlimit configured for eSM SafelyLimited Speed (SLS).
Correctives: Verify speed limit and delay time foreSM Safely Limited Speed (SLS).Adapt the drive values for ramp andvelocity, if necessary.

Description: eSM module: Repeated errordetected during Safe Operating Stop(SOS)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 23
eSM module: Repeated errordetected during deceleration forQuick StopParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
eSM module: /INTERLOCK_IN nothigh (timeout if t_Relay = 2)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 23
